Blogroll

My favorite blogs and websites, but not the only ones I read. The list will remain incomplete until I learn more about APIs, at which point I will connect it to Readwise.

  • Alan Jacobs at The Homebound Symphony
  • Freddie deBoer at Freddie deBoer's Blog
  • Dan Carlin at Look Behind You!
  • Gwern Branwen at gwern.net
  • Heather Cox Richardson at Letters From an American
  • Henrik Karlsson at Escaping Flatland
  • Maria Popova at The Marginalian
  • Paul Graham at paulgraham.com
  • Scott Aaronson at Shtetl-Optimized
  • Scott Alexander at Astral Codex Ten
  • Shaun Usher at Diaries of Note
  • Shaun Usher at Letters of Note
  • Tim Urban at Wait But Why

I built this website with Astro. You can see the source on GitHub.
